answers.answer: I went 2 weeks over-due with both of my previous pregnancies! I'm not even expecting this baby to appear until first week of May! Sigh...oh well... I've gotten used to being pregnant for-ev-er.
My 1st come @ 12:08am on his due date, but have a feeling this one is coming early, measuring 2wks ahead and I'm due April 14th

My first was 1 week before due date. 2nd was 2 weeks early. This I'm hoping for 1st week of April. I'm due the 23. I want sooner because it's spring break and I don't have to worry about the older one and school
Thank you ladies for your input :)
I'm also due April 4th..both my daughters were 3 days past their due date
I was 1 week over my due date
I am due 1 April. Good luck ladies.
Im due April 5th with my 3rd son. My first one came 2 days late and my second one was 1 day late.

I'm due April 22nd and my little one has been measuring a few days small each time...so I figure either he will be a small baby, or I'll be overdue...both of which I'm not too keen about but as long as he's healthy I'll deal with it!
My first was born on his due date but all his brothers all went late. My lastest was 6 days late. So hoping not to go late this time but not counting on going early that for sure.
I had my daughter at 38 weeks, I've been having contractions galore with this one, Braxton hicks or not this one may be early too.
Due April 4 but hoping a week early. My 1st was a week early, 2nd was 5days early but was induced due to preeclampsia. Don't wana miss Easter or baby's 1st bday April 8

question: I'm due april 4th how many moms made it to their actual due date I wanna be holding my catalina but not to soon either just wanna see her my first baby so i'm really wanna know :)
title: due dates
